file_content.text: I know who you are, hunter. You have made an enemy of Tarro Blood.
Even now, Tarro's comrades head to Nar Shaddaa to discuss ways to eliminate you from the Great Hunt.
I am sending you the coordinates of that meeting. I do not know how long they'll be there, so I'd suggest haste.
What's your interest here?
Why are you telling me this?
These Mandalorians chose not to participate in this Great Hunt so that Tarro would have a clear shot at victory.
This was a dishonorable act, unworthy of our traditions. It should not go unpunished.
Who should I thank for this intel?
And you are?
My name is Hedarr Soongh. Long ago, I was a Great Hunt champion.
I wish to see the integrity of the Great Hunt and our traditions preserved.
This your idea of a trap?
I wasn't born yesterday.
Yes, but you are not the one it's meant to ensnare.
Tarro robbed you of your allies in this competition, it seems only fitting that you return the favor.
I don't need to stoop to his level.
I'm better than that.
Hunter, we Mandalorians believe in blood for blood. This will be dealt with honorably.
I like the way you think.
Okay, I'm in.
There is no finer thing than the blood of an enemy righteously slain.
I'd rather bury his family, but friends are a start.
It'll do... for now.
Do not mistake this task for petty vengeance. This is justice.
Go to Nar Shaddaa. Confront those who have dishonored you and my people. Show them what it means to be a true warrior.
That was Hedarr Soongh! I can't believe it!
You think Soongh's on the level?
Can we trust him?
He's a living legend! There's no way he'd be in cahoots with a dirtbag like Tarro Blood.
A hero of yours?
Should I know him?
If you're done gushing, I want to know about your new crush.
Calm down.
If you ever kept up with anything, you'd be impressed too.
Soongh was the youngest bounty hunter ever to win the Great Hunt. But that was over sixty-five years ago.
He had an amazing career. Most of the crazy hunter stories out there are attributed to him. He's what bounty hunting is all about!
If Soongh wants to help us, we should seriously consider heading to those coordinates.
Bioscan incoming.
The Durasteel Duke... confirmed. Guess he wasn't blasterproof after all.
You're clear to move on.
Any word on our rival?
It's been confirmed that Iri-Do Sahn was disqualified in his sleep weeks ago. Guess he got sloppy.
Welcome to the final round, hunter. Contact your handler when you're ready to proceed. Good hunting.
I won't keep Crysta waiting.
Understood.
I don't think she's giving you a choice in the matter. Someone's trying to get through.
Can't wait to see what's next.
Great! Will do.
I know! I can't tell if I'm excited or terrified.
Just start prepping my parade.
Hunt's good as done then.
If you're looking to be surrounded by cheering fans, you really need to work on your personal skills.
Looks like someone's been trying to get through. What do you bet it's Crysta waiting to talk our ears off?
Competition's thinning out, hunter, try not to slip up in the last leg. Lek out.
I eliminated Tyresius Lokai.
I'll believe it when I scan it... huh, what do you know.
The body's bioscan matches. You just made a lot of crime bosses very happy. I've got a positive on the rival kill as well.
Credit for Tyresius Lokai goes to you. Stay hungry, hunter.
Go on, I've distracted you from the Great Hunt long enough as it is.
Glad to see you in one piece, hunter. Is that auction dead and buried?
The Great Hunt is safe.
It's done.
Looks like the Huntmaster's instincts were right.
What auction? I don't know of any auction.
Like it never happened.
Everyone involved in stealing the list is dead, along with everyone who came to bid.
Yes, so are the auctioneers.
That's what I wanna hear. Seems the Huntmaster was right about you.
Talk to me. This was more than a grab-and-shoot. Did you find out how that slicer got the list?
All signs point to Blood. His targets were the only ones not on the list.
I believe it was Tarro Blood.
If that's your only proof, it's fairly circumstantial.
Best keep those accusations to yourself. Tarro's pretty influential among my people.
The slicer swore on his deathbed he didn't know who put it on the HoloNet for him.
A mysterious contact.
Makes sense that the coward would hide. If he sold out the Great Hunt, there'd be hell to pay.
The slicer said it was one of your people.
It was a Mandalorian.
A Mandalorian? That's disturbing. But with no name, there's nothing we can do but keep alert.
We've got the target list back. That'll have to do for now.
Thanks for taking care of this, hunter. It was good doing business with you.
Your targets on Tatooine and Alderaan ain't gonna kill themselves. Go get 'em, pronto.
Get to Hutta and make sure that auction is a silent one.
Hunter. We don't have a lot of time, so I'll be brief. The sanctity of the Great Hunt has been compromised.
Seems a slicer got ahold of the Great Hunt's target list and intends to auction those names to the highest bidders.
Exposure like that would destroy the Great Hunt. I need this dealt with quickly and discretely.
I'm a professional. I always guarantee privacy.
I understand.
Good. You don't wanna end up on the next Great Hunt target list.
When's this auction taking place?
How long do I have?
Our informant seems to think it'll be soon.
What does a job like this pay?
And my fee?
A true bounty hunter. I like it. Don't worry, you'll be well-compensated for your time.
I need you to find the slicer and learn how he got that list.
Once the list is secure, eliminate every scrag stupid enough to show up to that auction.
Get this list. Tie up the loose ends. Got it.
One list coming up.
The Great Hunt is in good hands.
You can count on me.
The Huntmaster picked you for a reason. His instincts are rarely wrong.
Consider me as good as paid.
Good to hear. We can't afford any mistakes.
Nem'ro the Hutt's paymaster, Juda, told us about the auction. She's on Hutta; she can tell you more.
The fate of the Great Hunt rests in your hands. Remember that.
Congratulations, hunter, you've cleared the first round. Your next two targets are on Tatooine and Alderaan.
Transmitting your target briefings to you now. Your handler will be pleased to hear they didn't go to waste.
Before you move on to your next target, return to Dromund Kaas. We have something to discuss, in private. Lek out.
Wonder what that's all about? The Huntmaster's Assistant should never communicate with any hunter during a Great Hunt. It's just not done.
We'll know soon enough.
No point speculating.
I hope we didn't do anything wrong....
Nothing else has been predictable about this contest.
Honestly, I'm not surprised.
I'll agree with that.
Could this get us disqualified?
This a breach of protocol?
I don't know... the Huntmaster and his representatives have got to be completely neutral. Contacting the hunters could be seen as favoritism.
It doesn't sound like we really have a choice at any rate.
Better not keep him waiting, I guess.
The Eidolon's been taken care of.
My intel confirms that. The Hutt Cartel just yanked their "live" bounty on the Eidolon.
So I hear. Taking the Eidolon alive couldn't have been easy. Good job, hunter.
I have word that you eliminated your rivals as well.
I have word that your rivals forfeited to you as well.
Keep up the good work.
I've eliminated my targets on Balmorra.
Hold while I confirm... looks like things got messy, but you made a clean get away.
Credit for Admiral Ivernus goes to you.
Keep it up and we'll know you weren't just lucky. Lek out.
I'm busy. Go bother someone else.
